title: TikTok Library gaining GIPHY clips integration with content from HBO, Hulu, more
content:
Today, TikTok announced its new Library feature will include an integration with GIPHY clips (GIFs with sound); Library allows users to easily grab clips and make them part of their own videos. The addition of GIPHY clips brings new life to content so users can take their videos to the next level.

moreâ€¦

The post TikTok Library gaining GIPHY clips integration with content from HBO, Hulu, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Today, GIPHY announced its integration of GIPHY clips (GIFS with sound) within TikTok in the new Library feature.
